packrule-menus.config.buttonlocation.non: The menu buttons will only be accessible via ModMenu
packrule-menus.config.buttonlocation.opt: The menu buttons will be inserted atop the many buttons of the Options menu.
The menu buttons will be inserted right below the Difficulty button in the Options menu.
packrulemenus.gui.main.title: Packs/Rules Menus
packrulemenus.gui.worldoptions.title: World Options
packrulemenus.warning.featureflag.title: Feature Flags
packrulemenus.warning.featureflag.messag: You are attempting to enable or disable one or more feature flags. Restarting the world is required to apply those changes.
packrulemenus.warning.featureflag.checkb: I know what I'm doing; exit the world now.
packrulemenus.warning.vanillapack.title: Vanilla Data-Pack
packrulemenus.warning.vanillapack.messag: You are attempting to disable the Vanilla Datapack. THIS IS VERY LIKELY TO BREAK THE WORLD. Are you REALLY SURE you want to proceed?
packrulemenus.warning.vanillapack.checkb: I am ready to face the consequences.
